question: Which organisation delivered the 100th K9 Vajra tracked self-propelled howitzer to the Indian Army?
explanation:
Larsen & Toubro (L&T) has built and delivered the 100th K9 Vajra tracked self-propelled howitzer. This is the last howitzer of the contract awarded in 2017.
This system has been built with technology transfer from South Korean defence major Hanwha Defense. The howitzer was flagged off at the Indian Armyâ€™s armoured system complex at Hazira in Gujarat.
